tool_description: An API with Roster and Schedule Results for each NBA Franchise from 1977
name: 1977-2022 NBA Team Rosters and Schedules
title: 1977-2022 NBA Team Rosters and Schedules

api_list.name: Get All NBA Team Data from 1977-2022
api_list.description: Grabs all of the 30 NBA Franchise's Data from 1977-2022 into one object.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com/elements"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get NBA Franchise W/L Schedule for a Specific Year
api_list.description: Grabs NBA Franchise's W/L Schedule for a specific year
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com/elements/BOSTON CELTICS/2008/Schedule"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com/elements/{franchise}/{year}/{roster_schedule}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "1977-2022-nba-team-rosters-and-schedules.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Specific NBA Franchise Data
api_list.description: Grabs all NBA Data for a Franchise from 1977(if applicable)-2022
